roleset.name: immerse in a liquid
roleset.note: SOUSE-V NOTES: Based on internet search. Added by Katie due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class other_cos-45.4. (from souse.01-v)

example.name: Example with arg 2
example.text: We-1 were soused *trace*-1 with titan urine and sickened by the stench.

example.name: Example with arg 0
example.text: [She *1] didn't hesitate [* 1]to souse the Old Man himself with a plate of soup.

roleset.name: become drunk
roleset.note: SOUSE-V NOTES: Based on internet search. Added by Katie due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No VNcls. (from souse.02-v)

example.name: temporal clause example
example.text: When-2 everyone-1 was soused *trace*-1 *trace*-2, they play the game "I Never."
